channel.title: 508 Problems
channel.description:
I have a couple problems with the 508 source i have just downloaded.
Problem 1: You can attack people anywhere if you use mage. Choose a spell use it on player and bam!
Problem 2: You do not lose stuff when you die but it drops a random item.
If you know how to fix these 2 things please let me know. If not, do you know what file these would be in?
EDIT***
New problems:
Problem 3: Cant sell items to shops. If you click something, it gives you options as if you were not even in the shopping screen. (equip, examine, etc...)

item.title: 508 Problems
item.dc:creator: @server868 server868
item.description:
@server868 wrote:

You know of any 508 sources that have skillcape emotes, hd, godwars, and all working skills?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Problems
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

honestly, I would just find another source.

Read full topic
